info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 7:51AM CST until February 22 at 8:15AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN CALHOUN AND JERSEY COUNTIES... At 751 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grafton, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Grafton around 755 AM CST. Elsah around 800 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Jerseyville, Brighton and Kemper. This also includes Pere Marquette State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
